qa_pair.question: According to the IEEE formatting guide available through the MCP server, what font family and size in points should be used for code blocks?
What is the total horizontal margin space (left margin plus right margin) in inches required for IEEE documents according to the formatting standards?
What exact text marker (including angle brackets) should be placed on a separate line before a code section to indicate the start of a code block for IEEE formatting?
According to the IEEE formatting guide, what font size in points is specified for the document title?
What is the line spacing value (as a decimal number) used throughout IEEE documents for all text including body paragraphs?
What is the bottom margin measurement in inches specified by IEEE formatting standards?
According to the IEEE guide, what font should be used for section headings, and is it bold or regular weight?
What is the background color specified in the code block formatting section (in hexadecimal format including the # symbol)?
What is the font size in points specified for figure and table captions in IEEE format?
According to the formatting guide, what is the top margin measurement in inches for IEEE documents?
